properties.title: Spitzmeilenhütte SAC
properties.description: Spitzmeilen is a characteristic summit visible from afar. The modern, popular cabin for mountain hikers and mountain bikers is located at its foot. It was one of the SAC’s first winter cabins, which made the ski mountaineering area south of Flumserberge accessible. Families and hikers appreciate the vast high plateaus with their various possibilities of easy to fairly difficult ascents and manifold round trip hikes.
